Articles.Content:
Hello I am from the UK and pretty much a newbie only just managed to get a ship to orbit the earth (in an egg shape though) and learning the mechanics and messing around with the mechanics of the game. (still learning the spaceships but rockets I have about sorted now)

I am going to keep on making bigger and bigger ships that can get me to mun (i think thats what its called) etc.

but so far loving it.

Hi tomy90, welcome to the community

Bigger is not always better with KSP, though there is nothing stopping you from making huge rockets except your processor
